question: فَيَأْتِيَهُمْ
answer: And it will come to them

question: وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ
answer: and I will surely crucify you

question: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا
answer: So is it for Our punishment

question: الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
answer: the ones who are brought near

question: وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا
answer: And We caused to inherit them
